title: Nonperturbative Renormalization Group Equation and Beta Function in N=2 SUSY Yang-Mills
abstract: We obtain the exact beta function for $N=2$ SUSY $SU(2)$ Yang-Mills theory and prove the nonperturbative Renormalization Group Equation $$ \partial_\Lambda{\cal F}(a,\Lambda)= {\Lambda\over \Lambda_0}\partial_{\Lambda_0}{\cal F}(a_0,\Lambda_0) e^{-2\int_{\tau_0}^\tau {dx \beta^{-1}(x)}}. $$
